content: 1-2-3…baby beanie designed by lisa seifert | dolevalleygirlknits 1-2-3…a baby beanie is a super cute and easy knit for the special wee one s in your life originally designed to go with the in threes baby cardigan by kelly herdich i knit for my granddaughter a few years ago this is the revised version with sizing updates for a better fit  happy knitting a new expanded version is now available in my ravelry shop for only $2 99 includes  instructions for sizes 0-3 months thru 2-3 years for a total of five sizes  options for a solid or striped beanie with 1 2 or 3 garter stitch bands  photos & tips to assist you in knitting the jogless join when switching between garter & stockinette rounds 1 2 3…baby beanie | ©2013 2016 2018 lisa seifert & dolevalleygirlknits | all rights reserved | for personal use only page 2 sizes 0-3 mo 3-6 mo 6-12 mo finished measurements approx 5 5 75 6 5 inches from crown to brim comfortably fits head circumference up to 15 15 16 inches sizes are approximate measure for best fit if possible yarn worsted weight wool or wool blends samples were knit using lion brand martha steward crafts extra soft wool blend and knitpicks swish superwash merino wool you will need two colorways if knitting a striped beanie approx 50 - 75 yds needles us 4 3 5 mm 16 circulars and dpns or size to obtain gauge notions yarn needle stitch marker gauge 22 sts and 30 row = 4 in stockinette stitch on us 4 needles unblocked instructions using circular needle co 65 65 73 sts join to knit in the round being careful not to twist work as follows sl 1st st from left hand needle to right hand needle pass last co st over slipped st as if to bobble pull tightly to make a secure connection pm 64 64 72 sts note sm as you complete each round round 1 p all sts round 4 k all sts round 2 k all sts round 5 p all sts round 3 p all sts rounds 6 9 k all sts decide whether you want your beanie to have 1 2 or 3 garter stitch bands and then proceed as follows for only one garter stitch band continue in stockinette stitch until work measures 3 3 75 4 5 inches from beginning proceed to instructions for decrease rounds for two garter stitch bands repeat rounds 1-9 once then continue in stockinette stitch until work measures 3 3 75 4 5 inches from beginning proceed to instructions for decrease rounds for three garter stitch bands repeat rounds 1-9 twice then continue in stockinette stitch until work measures 3 3 75 4 5 inches from beginning proceed to instructions for decrease rounds decrease rounds note switch to dpns when necessary key round 1 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round  co cast on  k knit
